document.full_text: a loud noise coming from an unattended box that turned out to be christmas music prompted a security alert at the oklahoma city airport on friday that closed most of the facility for four hours, officials said.
document.title: loud christmas music from box sparks airport scare
lines_and_colors: a loud noise coming from an unattended box that turned out to be christmas music prompted a security alert at the oklahoma city airport on friday that closed most of the facility for four hours, officials said.
